column5: It was my understanding that one of the reasons for instituting the outdoor card was so people could order their licenses online. I have checked the Ontario MNR website but I dont see anything like that. Does anyone know if this is the case and when online ordering will begin?
Try this website. outdoorscard.mnr.gov.on.ca/ I didn't follow on thru to see for sure, but it looks like you can order online. You can also Google Ontario MNR Store and then click on The MNR Store.

"The target implementation date for the new system is late 2010". Here is the the link to the Ontario MNR website. The message is on the right side of the page.http://www.mnr.gov.on.ca/en/Business/LetsFish/ JDP
Guess I should have entered my Outdoors Card number and gone further in the process to find out it wouldn't work. Thanks JDP for getting us the right info.
Thanks for the info guys..I'll just order the license over the phone like I did last year..
Walmart would figure out how to do it now.

"Try this website. outdoorscard.mnr.gov.on.ca/ I didn't follow on thru to see for sure, but it looks like you can order online. " I found what you are referring to...unfortunately its only for Ontario residents at this time..
That was my understanding also (to ultimately allow online licensing), however, last week I called the 800 number on the back of my card and the gal said it probably won't happen until 2011.
